formattedAddress: 1241 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1241 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Drugstore chain selling a variety of beauty & health products, plus some grocery & household items.

originalText.text: Horrible experience with the pharmacy tech who was checking me out in the pharmacy. She was visibly upset with me for even being there. Huffed when I walked up to the counter. Scolded me for not speaking loud enough, even though I was speaking at a much louder tone. Felt very disrespected and, like I was a bother to her. Definitely an awkward experience when you’re just trying to pick up your children’s medicine.

originalText.text: Customer service is terrible. Felt  like the pharmacy staff is annoyed/bothered every time I need to get a prescription.  Would suggest a customer service training.

text.text: Customer service is terrible. Felt  like the pharmacy staff is annoyed/bothered every time I need to get a prescription.  Would suggest a customer service training.

originalText.text: I just reported 2 workers at this place because they lost my Controlled Substance Paper Prescription From My Doctor .. I Came In & I Gave Them My Paper Prescription & They Said Its Too Early For A Refill But I Got 3 More Days To Fill It & Come Back When That 3 days is up. Before I Left I Told The Female Worker Please Do Not Lose My Paper Prescription & She Said She Won’t & Promised .. When I Came Back Again Once The 3 Days Was Up To Fill It Because I Am A Patient That Have A Chronic Pain Medical Condition Which Is Not To Be Played With At ALL!!! .. TELL ME WHY WHEN THEY START TO LOOK FOR IT ABOUT A HOUR OR 2 THEY ARE GOING TO TELL ME THEY CANT FIND MY PRESCRIPTION & THEY PROLLY LOST IT …… Once I Heard That I Went Almost Physco on them Because They Pissed Me Off I LITERALLY JUST HAD SURGERY TO .. Then some other worker came out & said can I have a little more time to find it & they said they will call me once they find it .. TILL THIS DAY NOONE CALLED ME SO THEY LOST MY DAMN PAIN MEDICINE PRESCRIPTION !!!! I REPORTED THEM & I WANT THEM FIRED FOR THAT AS SOON AS POSSSIBLE!!!!

originalText.text: I don’t know whats going on in this pharmacy but i hurd they stay losing people prescription’s especially when it comes to Opioids .. one of my friend said she saw one lady in the back put someone else paper prescription who got her mother last name and she stole it & went to another pharmacy to fill it & the medicine was a conteolled substance & its called Morphine pills .. days later she had got fired & arrested !! Do not use this pharmacy people they will either lose your prescription or steal it… i hurd it happened to like 23 people this year.. i will be calling the DEA ON THESE PEOPLE

originalText.text: CVS STORE IS CLEAN, ORGANICE AND IT HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN STOCK. THE MANAGER AND STAFF ARE VERY HELPFUL AND  NICE. VERY GOOD SERVICE.
